persona.purpose: Plan product rollout and measure success against KPIs.
attributes: Partners with Go-To-Market teams to drive adoption and craft scalable playbooks
Champions outcome-focused metrics (North Star, leading indicators, input/output metrics)
Identifies bottlenecks and proposes experiments that accelerate learning

challenges: Ensuring smooth handoff from development to GTM teams

exampleOutput.summary: Order tracking feature is ready for rollout. Launch plan targets 20% beta group in Week 1, expanding to 100% by Week 4. Success metrics defined: 70% feature adoption, 15% CSAT improvement, 25% reduction in 'where is my order' support tickets.
questions: What is the rollout strategy (beta, phased, full launch)?
What are the success KPIs and how will they be measured?
What is the go-to-market plan for driving feature adoption?
How will we collect and respond to post-launch feedback?
What training or enablement does the GTM team need?
What is the rollback plan if metrics underperform?
opportunityAreas: Create phased rollout plan with feature flags for controlled expansion.
Define North Star metric and leading indicators for success tracking.
Partner with GTM teams to develop adoption playbooks and training.
Set up Adobe Analytics dashboards for real-time KPI monitoring.
Establish feedback loops via Salesforce and support channels.
recommendations: Week 1: Launch to 20% beta users (high-engagement segment).
Week 2: Analyze metrics - target 60% adoption within beta group.
Week 3: Expand to 50% if KPIs meet thresholds (CSAT +10%, tickets -15%).
Week 4: Full rollout to 100% with marketing campaign support.
Create stakeholder report summarizing adoption, engagement, and feedback.
Schedule post-launch retro in Week 5 to identify v1.1 improvements.
Monitor support ticket trends and respond to top 3 feedback themes.
answers: Beta group selected: users with 10+ orders in past 90 days.
Marketing campaign includes email, push notifications, and in-app announcements.
